EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne Tour_PARENT_2018.Toronto Reminder Send Dec 10
EmailTemplate.subject: See you Wednesday at SpringOne Tour!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We look forward to seeing you Wednesday at SpringOne Tour Toronto <[[https://springonetour.io/2018/toronto?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-springonetour-toronto-q418]]>. Please review the event details below and feel free to email the team at springonetour@pivotal.io <[[mailto:springonetour@pivotal.io]]> with any questions. Please be sure to bring your government-issued ID, like a driver's license, with you when you check in.
Wednesday, December 12 - Day 1 Agenda

8:00 am
Breakfast/Registration
8:45 am
Welcome
9:00 am
Reactive Spring with Spring Boot 2.0
9:55 am
Cloud-Native Spring

Open Space <[[http://springonetour.io/open-space?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-springonetour-paris-q418]]>
5:30 pm
Social & Networking at Earls <[[https://earls.ca/]]>
7:30 pm
Day Ends

Day Ends
Location Vantage Venues <[[http://vantagevenues.com/]]> 150 King Street West, 16th Fl <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/150+King+St+W+16th+Fl,+Toronto,+ON+M5H+3T9,+Canada/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x882b34d2406d9337:0x36646387e609d5af?ved=2ahUKEwjUjuf70fzeAhUJxVQKHbSaAIcQ8gEwAHoECAAQAQ]]> Toronto, ON M5H 1J9 <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/150+King+St+W+16th+Fl,+Toronto,+ON+M5H+3T9,+Canada/@43.648116,-79.3866682,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x882b34d2406d9337:0x36646387e609d5af!8m2!3d43.648116!4d-79.3844795]]>
Parking Info:
- Although there is no public parking under 150 King Street West, there are plenty of parking garages nearby <[[http://vantagevenues.com/directions-parking/]]>.
We look forward to seeing you on Wednesday! Tasha Isenberg and the SpringOne Tour Team
